sparql_query: SELECT (COUNT(?feature) as ?count) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Claywitch> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?polygonWKT . ?feature a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#DungeonCrawl> ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pointWKT . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?pointWKT, ?polygonWKT)) }
template_generated_nlq: How many DungeonCrawl are in Claywitch?
direct_llm_translation: How many DungeonCrawl features are located within the area of Claywitch?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: How many DungeonCrawl are in Claywitch?

sparql_query: SELECT ?mapLabel WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Arnskrone_Castle_Ruins> witcher:isPartOf <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Velen_Novigrad_Map> . <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Velen_Novigrad_Map> rdfs:label ?mapLabel . }
template_generated_nlq: Which map is Arnskrone Castle Ruins in?
direct_llm_translation: Which map contains the Arnskrone Castle Ruins?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: Which map is Arnskrone Castle Ruins in?

sparql_query: SELECT ?featureA ?featureALabel WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Nilfgaardian_Garrison> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?geomB_WKT . ?featureA a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#SideQuest> ; rdfs:label ?featureALabel ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?geomA_WKT . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?geomA_WKT, ?geomB_WKT)) } LIMIT 10
template_generated_nlq: List all Side Quest inside Nilfgaardian Garrison?
direct_llm_translation: Which side quests take place within the Nilfgaardian Garrison? (List up to 10)
context_enhanced_llm_translation: List all Side Quests located within the Nilfgaardian Garrison.

sparql_query: SELECT DISTINCT ?targetValueLabel WHERE { ?member <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#race> <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Human> . ?member <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#abilities> ?targetValue . OPTIONAL { ?targetValue rdfs:label ?label . } BIND(IF(isURI(?targetValue), ?label, ?targetValue) AS ?targetValueLabel) }
template_generated_nlq: What is the abilities of entities related to Human via race?
direct_llm_translation: What are the abilities of human characters in The Witcher video game franchise?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: What are the abilities of entities that have the race Human?

sparql_query: SELECT ?instanceLabel WHERE { ?instance a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#Signs> . ?instance rdfs:label ?instanceLabel . }
template_generated_nlq: List all known Signs.
direct_llm_translation: What are the names of all the Signs in The Witcher video game franchise?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: List all known Signs.

sparql_query: SELECT ?instanceLabel WHERE { ?instance a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#The_Witcher_3_main_quests> . ?instance rdfs:label ?instanceLabel . }
template_generated_nlq: List all known The Witcher 3 main quests.
direct_llm_translation: What are the names of all main quests in The Witcher 3?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: List all known The Witcher 3 main quests.

sparql_query: ASK WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Byways> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?geomA. <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Claywitch> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?geomB. ?path a witcher:Road ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pathGeom . FILTER(geof:sfIntersects(?pathGeom, ?geomA) && geof:sfIntersects(?pathGeom, ?geomB)) }
template_generated_nlq: Is there a road that connects Byways and Claywitch?
direct_llm_translation: Is there a road in The Witcher universe that connects the locations Byways and Claywitch?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: Is there a road that connects Byways and Claywitch?

sparql_query: SELECT ?instanceLabel WHERE { ?instance a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#Lakes> . ?instance rdfs:label ?instanceLabel . }
template_generated_nlq: List all known Lakes.
direct_llm_translation: What are the names of all lakes in The Witcher video game franchise?
context_enhanced_llm_translation: List all known Lakes.

sparql_query: SELECT ?instanceLabel WHERE { ?instance a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#The_Lady_of_the_Lake_characters> . ?instance rdfs:label ?instanceLabel . }
template_generated_nlq: List all known The Lady of the Lake characters.
